levels.storyText: Hey Elina! Remember when you came up to me in Advanced Functions class near Christmas? That's when everything started. Today is our monthly anniversary, and I have something special planned. But first... prove you remember where this all began. Unscramble this:

data.hint: Where we first talked... and where I fell for you

rewards.dressCode: Wear something cozy - we'll be walking around downtown. And bring your terrible sense of direction ğŸ˜

levels.title: Brunch Journey
levels.storyText: Our first date was at that French pastry cafÃ© on Queen Street West after school. Today we're doing brunch in Kingston style. But I won't tell you where yet... Match these colors to unlock the location!

levels.title: Downtown Exploration
levels.storyText: Remember all those times you took a wrong turn and we made jokes about it later? Well, today YOU'RE the navigator through downtown Kingston. Find and photograph these things:

items: A goat or cat (your favorite animals... if you can find one in downtown lol)
Something that would make a good study spot for us

rewards.message: You know what I love? When you call me when you need help or when you're crashing out. It makes me feel like I matter. And you always will matter to me. ğŸ’™

levels.title: Vintage Memories
levels.storyText: One moment I'll never forget: watching you on stage at your first dance performance. That's when I KNEW. Tomorrow I get to see you perform again, but today let's make more memories. Match these pairs!

rewards.location: End of the Thread Antique Emporium
rewards.activity: Time for vintage photos! Take 3 silly ones (make the dumbest faces) and 1 romantic one. Go!
rewards.message: Every moment with you is worth remembering. Even the dramatic ones, even the arguments, even the two breakups. All of it led us here. ğŸ’•

levels.title: Golden Hour
levels.storyText: Since August, we've been in the healthiest relationship we've ever had. No drama, just us. Let's create a silly story about our future. Fill in the blanks:

data.template: In 5 years, Elina will be a {{0}} doctor specializing in {{1}}. Erfan will still be a {{2}} software engineer who {{3}} every morning. We'll live in a {{4}} apartment with {{5}} goats and {{6}} cats. Every weekend we'll {{7}} and argue about {{8}}. Our biggest problem will be that Elina still can't {{9}} without Google Maps, but that's okay because I love her anyway. â¤ï¸

rewards.message: Remember when we broke up twice? And then we found our way back? That's because we're meant to be. Even when it's hard, even when we argue, we choose each other. ğŸ’™

levels.title: Dinner Time
levels.storyText: It's our monthly anniversary (2nd of the month gang!) and I know you're stressed about finals. Tonight is about YOU relaxing. But first, one last quiz about today:

questions.question: What school did we go to together?
What did I call you in Level 4?
How many times have we broken up?
What's my favorite thing about you?
options: When you call me when you need me

questions.question: What am I here for this weekend?

rewards.message: You're gonna crush your finals. You're gonna kill it in your performance tomorrow. And I'm gonna be there cheering for you. Ù‡Ù…ÛŒØ´Ù‡ ğŸ’™

levels.title: Ø¯ÙØªØ±Ú†Ù‡ Ø®Ø§Ø·Ø±Ø§Øª Ù…Ø§ (Our Memory Book)
levels.storyText:
Elina,

From that day you came up to me in Advanced Functions to today in Kingston, it's been a journey. Eight months to tell you I liked you, two dates before we stopped, a summer of phone calls from Spain, and then August 2nd when you asked me to be your boyfriend.

We've had drama. We've had arguments. We broke up twice. But every single time, we found our way back to each other. And since August, we've been better than ever.

I'm here in Kingston studying with you at Queens library (even though I go to Waterloo). I'm here to watch you dance tomorrow. I'm here because when you crash out or need help, you call me. And that makes me the happiest person alive.

You're going to be an incredible doctor. You're already an incredible dancer. And you're the most competitive, driven, talented person I know. 

This date is my way of saying: take a break from finals stress. You deserve to relax. You deserve to be celebrated. You deserve everything.

Ù…Ù† Ø¹Ø§Ø´Ù‚ØªÙ…. From Jarvis to Queens, from Toronto to Kingston, from August 2nd to forever.

Yours always,
Erfan

P.S. - Yes, you still suck at navigation. No, I don't care. I'll always help you find your way. ğŸ˜‚ğŸ’™
